attributes.action: Stop talentless singers getting their rubbish songs used as Bond themes
attributes.additional_details: Evidence? Just listen to the two tracks. Sam Smith track - cack. Radiohead track - beautiful.
attributes.background: The producers of the recent Bond film Spectre decided Sam Smiths' song 'Writing on the wall' was better than the song produced by Radiohead 'Spectre'. They were wrong. Sam Smith cannot sing. However Radiohead can make beautiful music and their song should have been used for the films title sequence.
